title: Scoped type hierarchy not displayed for binary projects
description: When trying to view the scoped type hierarchy for binary projects, I am getting a message stating 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I am not sure what this message means.
OB: When viewing the scoped type hierarchy for binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I see the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: When viewing the scoped type hierarchy for binary projects (e.g. org.apache.ant), I expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars.
SR:
1. Open the project for which you want to view the scoped type hierarchy.
2. Navigate to the scoped type hierarchy view.
3. Select a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant).
4. Observe the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
